meanings.definition: A person or company that forms a conglomerate.
meanings.sent1: The conglomerateurs worked together to create a big company.
meanings.sent2: The conglomerateurs joined forces to build a large corporation.
meanings.sent3: The conglomerateurs decided to team up and make a super business!
meanings.sent4: Like skilled architects, the conglomerateurs constructed a powerful empire.
meanings.sent5: The group of conglomerateurs combined their resources to form a mighty conglomerate.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a conglomerate.
meanings.sent1: The successful merger was thanks to the conglomerateurs' efforts.
meanings.sent2: The process of conglomerateurs coming together led to a strong partnership.
meanings.sent3: The meeting of the conglomerateurs resulted in a new business venture.
meanings.sent4: The collaboration of the conglomerateurs was like pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The conglomerateurs' teamwork in conglomerating was truly impressive.
